replies.txt_content: http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-248766-1-1.html 这是bs教程贴 变量已经很全了

replies.author: 3颗猫饼干
replies.txt_content:
Items
Money
Permissions
Commands (executed by Console)
PlayerCommands (executed by Player)
Points (PlayerPoints/CommandPoints/Enjin Points and all other BossAPI supported Points Plugins)
Timed Commands
Enchantments (Bought Enchantments are added to the item in the players hand)
"Shop" (This Reward will open an other Shop GUI)
BungeeCordServer (Sends Player to named Server. Needed: BungeeCord)
